fields.description: Name of the company who will receive the transaction.
The legal document relating to the formation of a company or corporation.
(Electricity, Gas, Water, Internet, Landline & Mobile Phone Invoice / Payment Schedule) no older than 3 months of the legal representative of your company
PDF including company name as well as IBAN

ID card or passport if the document has been issued in the EU, EFTA, or EEA / ID card or passport + resident permit or driving licence if the document has been issued outside the EU, EFTA, or EEA of the legal representative of your company
The amount (USD) to charge the credit card. Example: 42.50
Explain the reason why you want to charge manually the customer here
A semicolon separated values file stores tabular data (numbers and text) in plain text
Specify the product type to import
⚠️ The reason will be sent to the customer ⚠️
